item.title: By: Thomas Franz
item.dc:creator: Thomas Franz
item.description:
regarding the WHERE condition: As far I know it will be faster to check CHECKSUM(E.) CHECKSUM(U.<fieldlist) than to compare every single field with an OR.
Of course you could use the trick above to copy / paste the field list for both CHECKSUM functions
where checksum( e.[SalesTerritoryKey] , e.[FirstName] , e.[LastName] , ... ) checksum( u.[SalesTerritoryKey] , u.[FirstName] , u.[LastName] , ... )
item.content:encoded:
regarding the WHERE condition:
As far I know it will be faster to check CHECKSUM(E.) CHECKSUM(U.<fieldlist) than to compare every single field with an OR.

Of course you could use the trick above to copy / paste the field list for both CHECKSUM functions

where checksum(
e.[SalesTerritoryKey] ,
e.[FirstName] ,
e.[LastName] ,
…
)
checksum(
u.[SalesTerritoryKey] ,
u.[FirstName] ,
u.[LastName] ,
…
)
